sect1.title: 認証クライアント
sect1.para: The configuration file must be in the JSON format. Use the Autoinstallation Configuration module in &yast; to generate a valid JSON configuration file. Install the autoyast2 package. Launch &yast; and switch to the MiscellaneousAutoinstallation Configuration. Choose Network ServicesUser Logon Management, press Edit, and configure the available settings. Press OK when done. To save the generated configuration file, use the FileSave.
